head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHLACHTER, SARA ZUS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHLACHTER, SARA ZUS

block.p: SCHLACHTER-Sara Zus. On June 12, 2000. Beloved mother of Arthur Figur, M.D. Cherished grandmother of Charles, Leonard, MaryAnne, Amy and Margaret Figur, Jeff Schwartz and Julian Wyse. Great grandmother to Kaiya Bay June Wyse. Services Tuesday, 11:15AM, at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.

SCHLACHTER-Sara Zus. On June 12, 2000. Beloved mother of Arthur Figur, M.D. Cherished grandmother of Charles, Leonard, MaryAnne, Amy and Margaret Figur, Jeff Schwartz and Julian Wyse. Great grandmother to Kaiya Bay June Wyse. Services Tuesday, 11:15AM, at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
